title: ECE special topic for 3rd sem
content:
I had a few questions regarding the speical topics for 3rd sem ece 
1) What all subjects are offered and which among them is the most useful (with regard to industry demand)
2) How and when do we opt for a special topic? And is there a GPA criteria for selection?
3) Can we choose the faculty members or is it mentioned while opting for the special topic courses ?

comments.body:
1. They will send you a list of Special topics in the semester beginning. It is not at all same, it differs for every batch.   
2. Answered in 1. But there is no GPA criteria  
3. No, you cannot choose faculty members, it is allotted by Department to the respective special topics. Check in the list they will send
